td.content: s:female retired aged 67 years c/o 5 weeks h/o mild cough (not checked), mild fever, Respiratory. td.content: s:patient with C/O Mental Health for 4 weeks that is frequent. patient is a 67 yo female retired. she has a history of smoking denies any alcohol use o:Height 174 cm, Weight 65.1 kg, Temperature 37.2 C, Pulse 79, SystolicBP 114, DiastolicBP 76, Respiration 19 a:Schizophrenia p:performed E/M Level 2 (established patient) - Completed, and referred patient to psychiatry.

s:a 67 YO female retired presents with progressive Mental Health for past 4 weeks. td.content: s:68 yo white female retired presents with progressive Mental Health for past 10 days. o:Height 172 cm, Weight 62.4 kg, Temperature 37.1 C, Pulse 79, SystolicBP 104, DiastolicBP 64, Respiration 15 a:Schizophrenia p:performed E/M Level 2 (established patient) - Completed, and prescribed ABILIFY - 10 mg daily.

s:a 68 yo white female presents with mild cough and mild fever. she is having symptoms 15-17 x day, in spite of treatment. she has approx. a 30 pack/year history of smoking she denies drinking alcohol o:Height 173 cm, Weight 63.6 kg, Temperature 37.2 C, Pulse 80, SystolicBP 108, DiastolicBP 69, Respiration 17, nose = no nasal congestion, wheeze-LU, Heart = RRR, Normal S1/S2, no murmurs, all lung fields a:Shortness of Breath p:performed E/M Level 3 (established patient) - Completed, and prescribed OMS - 50 DEMAND OXYGEN nasal cannula, and ordered FEV1, FEV1/FVC, Pulse Oximetry.
